page.title: 04SALFORD PRIORS SCHOOL
page.content: Our school isn't very big.We have four classrooms but one is used as a library.We have a hall where we do games and eat our dinner. The infant class has children who are aged from four to six year olds. The next class is the middle class with children who are aged from six to eight year olds. In the top class the children are from the age of eight to eleven.In the whole school there are 85 children. The winter uniform is a grey skirt or trousers,a white or grey shirt and a maroon and silver tie.The summer uniform is a pink and white checked dress for the girls,but the boys wear their winter uniform. We learn English, mathematics, history, geography, science and games at our school.
